title: Tom Segura, Pete Holmes, Tiger Is Back And Baseball World Series Picks
description:
Tiger Woods is officially back. We talk some Masters with a sidetrack of Lebron and we're trying to stay positive about Max Homa. (00:02:10-00:11:41) We make our World Series predictions for baseball opening day.(00:11:25-00:19:44) Comedian Tom Segura joins the show to talk about his tour, comedy, and the injury that broke the internet.(00:21:00-01:10:20) Pete Holmes joins us in studio to talk about his new show, his past show ending, and more. (01:11:55-01:46:03) We finish with Fyre Fest of the week.Â (01:48:07-02:04:09)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
